Entries.default: "Like as not, this staircase leads to the top of the archive."
"Meet you at the top. I've had it with stairs."
"Something perches up there. I can feel it."
"That door were guarding more fucking stairs? Better be something right nice up top."
"Ain't nowhere left to go but up."
"Look, captain. What might we find if we ascended to the top of this buried sanctum?"
"If the floor above was restricted, imagine what awaits us at the top of this."
"Maybe they keep their best books at the top of the library. Shall we?"
"You go ahead, Duskspeaker. I'll be waiting here when you return, ja?"
